org.gearvrf.asynchronous

Class GVRCompressedTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRTexture
        • org.gearvrf.asynchronous.GVRCompressedTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class GVRCompressedTexture
extends GVRTexture
    A GL compressed texture; you get it from GVRContext.loadCompressedTexture(). This is mostly an internal, implementation class: You may find mLevels and/or mQuality useful.
    Since:
    1.6.1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BALANCED
      Strike a balance between speed and quality
      int mLevels
      Number of texture levels.
      int mQuality

      static int QUALITY

      static int SPEED
      Optimize for render speed

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • mLevels

        public final int mLevels
        Number of texture levels. 1 means a single image, with no mipmap chain; values higher than 1 mean the texture has a mipmap chain.

      • mQuality

        public final int mQuality
        The speed/quality parameter passed to GVRContext.loadCompressedTexture(). This copy has been 'clamped' to one of the public constants in GVRCompressedTexture.

      • SPEED

        public static final int SPEED
        Optimize for render speed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BALANCED

        public static final int BALANCED
        Strike a balance between speed and quality
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QUALITY

        public static final int QUALITY
        Optimize for render quality
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
